title: Financhill
description: FinanChill solves your budgeting needs by organizing and displaying your budget information more easily than ever.
Users can enter the income, necessary, and unnecessary expenses, and FinanChill will use this information to approximate over time how much the user has saved.
This information can be updated overtime as the state of the user's budget changes.
The user can also add purchases that they are considering making in the future, and FinanChill will make advisements depending on the current savings progress.
FinanChill brings a simple, visually oriented solution to the often daunting task of responsible budgeting.

title: Note-Taker
description: This is the application that can write, save, and delete notes.
This application will use an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.
When we click on the stored data listed on the left side it will show the details in the right side.
When we click the delete icon it will delete the data and when we add the data and save, it will save in the database db.json file.

title: Eat-Da-Burger
description: This is the project which create a burger logger with MySQL and following the MVC design pattern.
It is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of the burgers they'd like to eat
When a Whenever a user submits a burger's name, your app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured.

title: uDecide
description: uDecide helps voters get to know their current federal representatives for the election cycle. We provide a single pane of glass for users to know who their four representatives are President, two Senators, and House member.
We display this information in a user friendly way using UI Semantic cards element.
Once the user has been introduced to their representative, then we dynamically display a button to see what legislation they have sponsored (usually a good indicator of their priorities in office).
We hope users can then use this information to decide if their values are being appropriately represented by their current federal official.
If not, Nov 3, 2020 is the day to make your opinion matter!

title: Day Planner
description: In this project, we made a daily planner which helps in making plans for the selected time slot and save it by pressing the button, which we can refer it later on whenever we go through the planner.
We used Bootstrap CSS Framework as well as our own and.
We used Moment.js library to work with date and time.

title: Password Generator
description: The purpose of this assignment was to generate password with different sets of requirement.
It generates a random password based on user-selected criteria.
This app will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by your JavaScript code.
It will also feature a clean and polished user interface.
